description: This year, why not raise a toast to all women with a Tic-Tac Bomb shot? This delicious cocktail is made with orange&nbsp;vodka, orange juice, and an energy drink, and it's perfect for celebrating in style. So gather your friends and get ready to&nbsp;party!
name: Orange Tic-Tac Bomb

recipeInstructions.name: Fill a shot glass with orange rum.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill a shot glass with orange rum.

recipeInstructions.name: Half fill a pint glass with an energy drink and add orange juice.
recipeInstructions.text: Half fill a pint glass with an energy drink and add orange juice.

recipeInstructions.name: Drop the shot glass onto the pint glass and enjoy your drink!
recipeInstructions.text: Drop the shot glass onto the pint glass and enjoy your drink!
